item.title: Better Together = Defender CSPM + Database Protections
item.description: By default, there are over 30 recommendations pertaining to database resources spread across Azure, AWS, and GCP. Quite often, the Cloud Security Admin who is spending time in Defender for Cloud isn’t the person responsible for the configuration or remediation of a database resource. If your Database Administrators are swamped with work (highly likely), the Cloud Security Admin needs to ensure that their asks of the Database Administrators have a high return on investment. With the combination of Defender CSPM + database protection plans, we can achieve that ROI with Attack Paths and Cloud ...
